WARNING!

Filesystem is not writable!

We have detected that your Apigility Admin API is running without the ability to write to one of the following directories:

  • config/
  • config/autoload/
  • module/

As such, the Apigility Admin API will not be able to do its work, which involves writing and updating configuration files, as well as generating PHP class stubs.

To correct the issue, make these directories, and all descendents, writable by the user under which the web server is running (we've determined "{{ user }}" from the server).

Once you have updated the permissions, reload this page.
